goal.ch:
“主旨：中國哲學進行現代詮釋之進路之一乃與西方當代哲學對話，而西方哲學之優點常被認為在其哲學思想方法或方法學。因此本課程為此種對話性的中國哲學現代詮釋之初階，首在為學子介紹當代西方哲學思想方法學之精髓。
學習目標：一、理論方面︰首先由方法問題在思想理論及思想史雙層次之源生起、特別是在對古典懷疑論論證及其批判性反思中導入人類思想方法學之基本脈絡性關係架構。接著在系統性及發展性雙向度中介紹當代西方各種科學方法論(Methodik)、研究方法取向(approach)及思想方法(method)等之基源：當代西方哲學方法學(Methodology)之主要思潮，亦即由廣義英美分析哲學中之科學哲學(philosophy of science)論爭、語言分析學派(analytical philosophy)，經廣義歐陸詮釋學中之辯證法學派(Dialektik)、現象學學派(Ph?nomenologie)、哲學詮釋學學派(philosophical Hermeneutik)，而至企圖綜合英美、歐陸兩大陣營之廣義實用主義(Pragmatismus)中之科學哲學、詮釋學及建構學派(Konstruktivismus)。在每介紹一學派方法核心構想及構成要素及其基本邏輯結構後，均予以系統內在性及外在性批判，並藉以導入另一學派。在各學派中並擇一段經典文獻導讀詮釋，不但藉以引領學生直接入門，亦培養同學原典閱讀能力。在總結部分並由方法學角度提出整合不同學派方法之各種可能性。
二、實踐方面︰訓練同學實際進行碩士論文之構思工作：由選擇研究領域方向，確定研究主題範圍，審思研究方法架構、尋找搜集及首次閱讀研究主要原典及次要參考資料，到提出論文構思綱要等初步工作。“
goal.en:
“Subject: One of the essential approaches for the modern interpretation of Chinese philosophy shall be dialogue between this and contemporary Western philosophy, and it is often considered as the advantages of Western Philosophy in its thinking way as method or even methodology. Therefore, this course shall be the first step for students who interest in such kind of dialogical approach for modern interpretation of Chinese philosophy, to introduce the essence of contemporary Western philosophical thinking as method from the methodological point of view.
1. Theoretical Dimension: At first with respect of the methodological problem  this seminar shall begin with the doubling-dimensional genesis of thinking-theory and idea-history. Especially it shall introduce the basic contextual relation-framework of human methodology of thinking from the argumentation of classical skepticism and a critical reflection of it. Then it will inaugurate the origin of contemporary western instrumental methods, research-approaches and philosophical method in both of the systematical and developmental dimensions. The main trends of the modern Western philosophical methodology, i.e. from the philosophy of science and analytical philosophy under the Anglo-Saxon culture, through the dialectics, phenomenology and philosophical hermeneutics under continental culture, to the trying synthesis of these two groups: the pragmatic philosophy of language, the constructivism and systemic hermeneutics. After presenting the central conception, construct-elements and the basic logical structure of each methodological trend, it shall also notice its immanent and transcendent criticism and then initiate the next methodological concept. We will finally select and interpret same classical text of these methods, not only to introduce the students directly into the world of philosophical methodology, but also to shape the their capability of text-reading and understanding. 
2. Practical Dimension: this course shall train the students for their conception of Masters dissertation. They will learn, how to choice the direction of the research field, to decide the focus of research theme, to search and research the primary text and the secondary literature, and to project the ground-concept of the dissertation.“

outline.ch:
“1.導論：思想，哲學，方法及方法學
2. 基本哲學史脈絡：從古典希臘文化談起
3. 基本概念：從philosophy 之語源學談起
4. 基本問題意識源生：懷疑論
5. 基本脈絡性關係架構：存有學，知識學，實踐哲學
6. 基本思想方法典範
7. 理念論，理性主義，觀念論
8. 實在論，經驗論，唯物論
9. 科學哲學論爭
10. 語言分析學派
11. 日常語言學派
12. 先驗哲學派
13. 辯證法學派
14. 現象學學派
15. 哲學詮釋學學派
16. 建構學派
17. 後現代詮釋學
18. 開放性結論:方法之終結？體系性哲思“
outline.en:
“1. Introduction: the meaning of thinking, philosophizing, method and methodology
2. Basic context: the genesis of the Western culture and philosophy
3. Basic ideas: from the etymology of “philosophy”
4. Basic problem of philosophy and method: skepticism and its basic contextual framework
5. Basic framework of philosophical thinking: ontology, epistemology and practical philosophy
6. Basic classical paradigm of philosophical method: instrument, medium and way
7. Theory of ideas, rationalism, idealism
8. realism, empiricism, materialism
9. The conflict of philosophy of science
10. The analytical philosophy in the narrower sense
11. The philosophy of language
12. The transcendental philosophizing
13. The dialectics
14. The phenomenology
15. The hermeneutics
16. constructivism
17. The postmodern hermeneutics
18. Open conclusion: The end of method? Systemic philosophizing“

W.F. Hegel, Science of Logic/ G.W.F.Hegel, trans. By A.V.Miller,George Allen ＆ Unwin, 1969.
E. Husserl, Ideas pertaining to a Pure Phenomenology and to a Phenomenological Philosophy, Martinus Nijhoff Publishers, 1982.
M. Heidegger, Being and Time, trans. by J. Macquarrie ＆ E. Robinson, Malden, MA : Blackwell, 1962.

參考書
Kurt Wuchterl, Methoden der Gegenwartsphilosophie, Stuttgart: Haupt, 1999“
